segments.text: I hope you're not turning into a sissy on me , Dave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , I want to succeed just as much as you do . Well , maybe not quite that much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If we let Vince and Elvin continue to run things , invoking is going to fail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you trying to say ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm saying this ship needs a new captain . Are you with me , or aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1
